Text: thanks a/v 10.  looks like tpb finally got rid of the thumbs up and thumbs down rating system, about time!

For the second time i am replacing your 1080p with 1080p. First the curious case of benjamin button and now this one. i am not complaining here, you are getting better everyday !!! thanks for sharing !!!
Thank you so much for all your work - I am enjoying showing my husband some of my old favorites here in Mexico.  I appreciate all your time!  We play MP4 thru through our Apple TV - great!
